amendment.description: An amendment numbered 37 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to end the practice of prison gerrymandering whereby incarcerated persons are counted in Census population counts as residents of correctional facilities and not their most recent residence prior to imprisonment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Pocan.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
